EmailTemplate.subject: Shell Fuel Card Program - Deposit Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in our Shell Fuel Card Program!
Unfortunately we weren't able to get your approved for an unsecured credit line, but we can still do a secured credit line with a deposit! The functionality is just the same, the credit line would just be backed by your deposit. You can choose however much you'd like to send in as a deposit and that would turn into your monthly credit line.
To enroll in an account with us, please send in a deposit to secure the account along with the attached Deposit form. You may either mail the deposit to our bank or wire us the funds.
Sending the deposit by mail:
Complete and sign the attached deposit agreement (the minimum deposit is $500) Send the form to our bank (address below) with a certified check, money order or cashier’s check for the deposit amount you would like to put on deposit. Reference opportunity # (insert number here) and mention the check is for a secured deposit in the memo section of the check. Email a copy of the completed and signed deposit agreement to me at the email noted below
Bank Address: WEX Bank 7090 Union Park Center, Suite 350 Midvale, UT 84047
Wire Transfer Instructions:
Account Name: WEX Inc. Account Number: 4539508 Receiving Instructions: Harris Bank (311 West Monroe, Chicago, IL 60606) ABA/Routing Number: 071000288 Please reference opportunity # (insert number here) Memo Section: Please mention the check is for a secured deposit Email a copy of the completed and signed deposit agreement to me at the email noted below
When the deposit is received your account will be set up and the deposit applied will become your line of credit.
You can call me at {!User.Phone} if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
